text: The bundle of hair that I bought from Sherie was absolutely some of the most beautiful hair that I have purchased I actually still have it it's been a little over a year now.

name: claudia toney
text: Really good deal on bundles and great quality hair. The bundles are thick and they don’t shed or have a bad smell! If you are in the Atlanta area you can contact the seller for the install and she does a good job! I’ll definitely be back!

text: Amazing service. The lady who owns the place is so sweet and kind. My favorite wig place to go to for my hair needs. ❤️

text:
Ordered online so idk if it’s relevant but omg very happy w my costumes!!! Not only were they price appropriate (or maybe on the more affordable side) but they were like super fresh as in unused and unopened. They arrived mad quick too which was unexpected considering everything’s thats happening in the usa .

Very pleased w my Minnie and fortune teller costume! Will order again nxt year

text: Just to let any travelers know- as the blonde woman said upon my arrival “ We are not a store, this is a warehouse, you have to order online “. So you definitely can’t trust google and don’t expect they’ll let you sit in the lobby either. It’s raining and I still had to wait outside for a lyft

They are so cheaply made I dont even know if they will last through the party. Definately NOT WORTH $24.95!!

text: Wonderful experience. Great customer service!!!! Purchased one bundle to complete a sew in. I was pleased with their product and professionalism. Thanks!!!!

name: Ashley Hatcher
text: Love the hair! I can't complain! Great service and all questions are answered without an attitude. I never had a problem with anyone who've worked there. This is the only place I purchase my hair from and plan on keeping it that way. All I have to say is my beautician name and they know where to direct me as far as color and other hair products! I had my hair for over year and it still looks brand new when my beautician puts it in. Getting married in 2 weeks, so I will be in tomorrow to purchase new bundles!! Thank you for all you do!

name: LaToya Mayweather
text: I am in love with this business. Why? Its Black owned. The people who work there are friendly and kind. The are also knowledgeable about the products they sale and more.

name: shalina Covington
text: Hair smells like a bag of fritos. . . The closure sheds really bad! I was hoping i would be a return customer. Pricing it way too high for the quality of the hair. I've bought better hair from a Asian hairstore (sadly.) Its a no for me.

name: Keziah French
text: I just put my hair in yesterday from first choice, this Brazilian body wave hair is full of body. Holds curls longer. I would strongly suggest you purchase your hair from first choice. The bundles are a bit small, so I would recommend getting 4 bundles.

name: Shertia Pace
text: High Quality hair, friendly and helpful. Satisfied customer. Since this post, my daughters have had their hair for a year & it is still soft & without tangles.

text: I think a couple run it and they are always friendly and helpful. Never bothered when you ask prices or to see items and always just pleasent. Couldn't ask for a better place to shop.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!! We appreciate your support!!

name: Kamali Dixon
text: I bought some hair at First Choice in Mobile Alabama on the 14th of July. I put my hair in the same day I bought it. Three day later my hair start looking horrible. It sheds really bad and it's nappy. It doesn't look like quality hair at all. I'm very disappointed because I've bought hair from this place before and it was good. I spend $368.00 on this hair and I can't even reuse it. I will not purchase any more hair at this place. I wish I could post a picture of this hair. I am being generous by giving them one star.

name: Courtney pettis
text: Hair is very pretty, sheds a bit if you cut. Hair does have a horrible corn chip smell for these prices, that should not be. I would purchase again but only the straight hair to avoid the smell.

name: Samantha Campbell
text: They sell the knock off the product is not what they advertising. I pay for what I want no matter the price. If I could give them Zero rating I would. They will never have to worry about my service again!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Ms Campbell. However, as our policy states we do not refund or exchange waist trainers due to customer safety and hygiene issues. This is why you was allowed to try on and/or observe the product as necessary before purchase. It's unfortunate that you would make such a libelous statement that we sell knock off products. We only sell authentic Colombian waist trainers directly from the manufacturer.

text: Bought two scarfs for $3.99. Came back to the store two days later because I wanted to exchange or store credit for them because the scarfs didn’t work for what I need them for. And I understand they don’t do refunds but the woman would not let me exchange or store credit because she said the scarfs had been used and she couldn’t resale them and was rude about it. It also made no sense because they are simply scarfs and were in the same condition I bought them . Really wish we would stop spending our money with these types of ppl. Because there would be no business without us.

text: First time visiting ever! Nice selection, great prices, and friendly staff. Would recommend to all my sistas to visit this store you'll be surprised what you find. Love it

text: A great store to shop. I was looking for something different and Alex recommended me to try the brand Legend hair and I love it! I bought a bundle and made it into clip-ins. Great experience and satisfied customer.

name: diane talton
text: I visited this store on 01/06/2021. Alex was so helpful in finding and having everything that I needed. He took time out with me while helping other customers as well. The smile,  funny attitude and the friendliness when you first enters the store is what grabs me. Great customer service is a plus for me and I will forever be a customer. The store was well organized and clean. Cheap prices!!! I have told friends and family about my first transaction which was WONDERFUL. I hope it stays in that location for a long time.

text:
I like the place. It’s a big area mostly filled with accessories and mask. Thy have a small area for decorations. I looked through the store they have a wide variety even a Kim Jong-un mask. When we pulled up they had a couple of inflatables out in front a 6 foot Dino and 11-12 foot dragon. The dragon is nice the wings move also while inflated. I told them I want it and they said everyone does. I said agin I want it do I need to bring out the card to pay for it. Then they realized I ment it. It was funny. I’m sure there are others but for me this is the first I’ve seem with moving parts.
Go and look around could fine that interesting item for your house or to wear

name: S B
text: If you want to exchange something make sure to have the receipt with you.  The guy at the register made me go back out in the pouring rain to get a receipt. I was returning a $5 item in exchange for a $35 item. He should have been able to exchange without a receipt but luckily after 5 minutes I found it in my car. The lady at Spirit Halloween was wayyy friendlier!

name: Terry Ikner
text: I hate this store is only here for a few weeks it is by far my favorite Halloween store. I always track down the store to the seasonal location, but I must say the staff this year is FANTASTIC! Very attentive, knowledgeable, and willing to help in any way.

name: Stacey C.
text: The management is very rude, condescending, and tries to incite customers negatively. Additional up-to-date training should be mandatory for the staff in the future, as the current management is very unprofessional and should not be supervising or advising employees. Management should not be rehired at the company's next pop up shop.

name: Serena kay
text: My autistic son absolutely loves Halloween and the staff was very friendly and helping us thank you for the great visit.

name: Latasha Pippins
text: I am so glad that all of these reviews are so favorable. On Saturday October 26, 2019 my 23 year old daughter, my 9 year old daughter, and my 1 year old granddaughter went into this store. After browsing and finding a costume but not all of the needed accessories they left without making a purchase.They returned after visiting another Halloween store to purchase the costume. The manager then accused her of shoplifting and admitted to following them around the store. After my daughter willingly allowed her to look in her purse, finding nothing, the manager still called the police. My daughter stayed and waited on the police asking to see any video showing her shoplifting. The police officer then examined her purse and found nothing.The police officer asked them to leave and said that the manager did not want them to return to the store. I'm a little confused because I did not know that you could be banned from a store for trying to spend money, because my silly daughter was still wanting to purchase the costume.The manager never apologized or admitted to being mistaken, but she did say "that she know what "you people" do and that she was going to jail and told my 9 year old that she and her niece were going to DHR." I'm glad that the people that had these great  experiences were not the "you people"  that steal. I do not recommend that people of color shop at this store our money is no good there. I GIVE THEM NO STARS, I ACTUALLY NEED 5 OF THEM BACK, BUT THE COMPUTER WANT LET ME POST WITHOUT ONE!!!!

name: Linnea Washington
text: They are rude I paid for a item and  I left it and I called back about it and the so called manger was rude I asked for their name they refused to give it to me this is not the way to do business the manger told me they was  about to closed and she didn’t care about what I had to say I really hope the owner reads these comments because rude people should not be working in a place that deals with customer service not only is it hurting your business but it hurting your sells as well I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone they are straight rude and racist I will go to spirit Halloween from now on learn how to talk and treat people with respect regardless what color skin they may have

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Seasonal Halloween store. Same stuff as last year.

name: Angela MacMahon
text: I visited Wig World yesterday. I know absolutely nothing about wigs and the young owner was extremely nice and helpful. Huge variety of styles and colors. I will definitely be back!!

name: M M
text: I went for the first time today, traveling from Fort Payne. The owner was very nice. She helped me try some on, then let me take my time to look and try on more. I ended up leaving with 2 because she has great prices! A great experience.

name: Doris Davidson
text: I love her very friendly great wigs and great prices

name: Nicole
text: I decided to grow my hair out but I love trying out different cuts and styles so I thought I would buy a wig. They lady told I didn't need a wig. Small selection.

name: Janice Underwood
text: Omg!!! I love Wig World. My mom and I have been shopping there for years. The owner is extremely nice and helpful all the time. She has quality wigs at great prices. Love love love it.

name: B W
text: Yes ! The lady was very helpful ' and was not pushy . got 1 wig at a good price .i love it !

name: Crystal Holgate (Holgate Paramed Svcs.)
text: Has some decent wigs, but god forbid you try to touch them!

name: Marsha Lynn
text: Friendly people, good, nice products and reasonable prices. Very pleased with our visit there. First time visiting this store.

name: Karen Gritzmacher
text: Love the variety and the owner is so sweet and helpful to me.

name: Johnny Vinyard
text: Owner a very sweet and helpful person, She has a very large selection. Has always ordered me one if she didn't have it in stock,

name: Elizabeth Muskett
text: WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE! EXCELLENT SELECTION AND PRICES! 👍👍👍

name: Autumn Abernathy
text: I went there today to Find a color that's good for me before I went and spent money on getting my hair done and didn't like it. Poor service. The lady working there was very rude and didn't wanna help me at all . I asked to try one on and she said why do u wanna try it on ? Well maybe because I wanna see how it looks.🤔 a black lady was in there and she was nice to her.. I guess she's against white people.

name: Aubrey Edwards
text: These wigs are perfect for customers whom are looking to perfect their look!

name: Bryan McDaniel
text: you Will love the great selection and great customer service.

name: nina bone
text: Wig World in Gadsden is the place to find solutions for any hair loss problem. Chemo patients and anyone experiencing hair loss regardless of age or gender can find a solution at Wig World.

name: Felicia Hazelrig
text: Nice Lady helped me. Very kind.suggest them to anyone having to deal with hair issues.

name: Brittney Blackburn
text:
I use to shop here years ago, went on today and I realize why I stopped shopping here. My whole female population of family members used to shop with Chun-cha I gave her almost 15 years Of my service but today I am truly never going back.
When I went in the store I had my 3 year old she didn't greet me and was very rude. She acted as if she doesn't want you to touch the wigs. Same as last time I went but this time my 3 year old daughter saw me about to try on a wig and begged to try on before I could even get it close to her she started yelling about a stocking cap. Which I had one on but my 3yr old has no lice or nuts we are african American  and she just over reacted so I politely took the cap off and hauled out of her establishment. I will never spend my money with her not will my family.
I was sick all the years and business we have given her and she treated me like I was yesterday's trash.

name: RAGAN WILLMORE
text: Started coming here for the last few months.it was à very embarrasing thing for me at first, but the lady is super Nice and makes me feel confortable each time.thanks so much!

resp.text: Thanks Kaiden! We appreciate your business!!

name: Michele Bowers
text: Very bad service the lady that runs place was so rude to me wouldn't help me but a black lady came in and she was so nice to her!!!! I ask for help and she very rudely said when I'm done with her and the other lady was walking around store on phone the whole time she could of helped me. I guess she has something against white people will never go back!!! Don't shop here if your white!!!! Oh and did I say I was there before that lady for 15 minutes!!!

resp.text: We are very sorry to here about your visit. I want to reassure you and let you know that we do not discriminate here. This is a Christian run business. We carry hair suitable for any race. We also specialize in hair for cancer patients.

name: Evelyn Wright
text: The owner is friendly, I shop there often.I support local merchants.

name: Jon Saint Germain
text: Always fun. By the time we got there this year October 12th, the store looked pretty well picked over. So the lessons: buy early, buy often.

name: Shane Kitts
text: Good place if you are an amateur on decorating for Halloween, I've been decorating for over 30 years. This isn't the place for advance Halloween decorators.

name: Editor Kitty
text: terrible, half the items were broken.. the system kept locking up on checkout. they had three anamatronics on display.. one was broken and the place was put up so poorly.. you would think they would at least try to make it look good.

name: Alexa M
text: Just awful. Very bad selection, dark fitting rooms filled with costume parts, very messy, and only one staff member. AVOID AT ALL COST.

name: Chanda
text: Product rang up at the wrong price.  Had to wait 10 min for manager to override as they were short staffed. Did not have enough choices and some were quite expensive.

name: Jason McGhee
text: Pretty cool place to visit once a year.

name: Kimberly McAbee
text: What a joke! Who would want to buy anything from a store that the item is already broken

name: Jeremy Cummings
text: Arrived at 8:00pm, sign posted clearly states they are open till 9pm on Saturdays, doors were already locked.

name: Whitney Worley
text: Had a good experience

name: Angela Boysel
text: Poor selection of costumes

name: Mike Petermen
text: A lot of choices here, for all ages.

name: Blake F
text: JUST TERRIBLE!!!!

name: Ayana Weaver
text: I don't like the no refund policy.

name: Neatria Osborne
text: The best money i ever spent.  Ckim is very pretty and super kool.... And she is bad with those hands...

name: Samantha Ferguson
text: So, I’ve called the past 2 days at random times (1 pm, 5pm, 6pm) and I can never get an answer. Then I came to the salon in person at 6:30pm today to see if I could schedule an appointment. There wasn’t anyone there, but the open sign was light up... is this place still in business? I’d love to schedule an appointment if they are 🤗

name: Tiffiney Stallworth
text: Because they are so nice n professional

name: Stacy B
text: I was just a walk in and they treated me like a regular. My hair is still beautiful 2 weeks later.

name: Brittany Perry
text: I strongly advise making sure you know who you are booking with. I saw Ckim’s ig. Loved her work and made the call. The person on the phone said yea we put you down in the books. Again, I called to book an appointment with CKIM (Chanelle) however when I arrived someone else was my stylist. That’s cool as long as my hair is done correctly. Well, it wasn’t. My style of choice was a sleek ponytail. I paid $88 for a beautiful bundle of Barbie curl and $50 for the style. I told her before leaving that I felt insecure and asked her if she could spray more holding spray on the style. She sprayed a tiny bit more. However, the style didn’t last a week. I did tie it down everyday. Didn’t exercise. The ponytail broke in half after 3 days and the swoop moved everyday. The stylist Kierra put glue all over the bundle so, I can’t reuse it. Basically money gone down the drain. Chanelle is very kind and professional. From what I saw she makes sure her clients are satisfied before leaving. Just make sure that when you call, you are booking with Ckim (Chanelle) and not accepting any other stylist.

name: Lashawn Moten
text: Great baber

name: APRIL KEARNS
text: Always friendly and professional!!!

name: Makinda Andrews
text: The best

name: Daija Taylor
text: I got a silk press! Love everything about it and the salon is beautiful! I will return!

name: DAB3
text: Mrs. Edwards is a personable professional. Every time I go she is always in a good mood. She is very knowledgeable about hair maintainance and things that effect hair health. I can leave her shop ready for work or a night out. My hair is always on point!

name: Jennifer swain
text: Very professional and uplifting environment. Every time I have had an idea of a hairstyle she has always brought it to life. I have gotten a couple of wigs made and every time I have worn them I have gotten nothing but compliments on my hair. If you are looking for a private salon due to hair loss or just your preference I recommend Salon Wygs.

name: Crystal Robinson
text: This was my first time getting my hair done at this salon....I love my hair and the owner is great! If you are looking for quality stylist that has a lot of knowledge about hair, this is the place to go. I appreciated her fitting me in at the last minute and her kindness. I will be returning! I have gotten so many compliments on my hair.... thank you KI.

name: LaToya Brown
text: If you are indecisive like me, Ki is your go to person. I NEVER know what I want but when I leave her chair, I got everything I need.  Heaven sent.

name: Wynette Mcwilliams
text: As noted, it was a  Great experience with a great person, but my only issue was the communication on the website. It noted that I should be there an hour  and that the price was $75-$85. The price I pay was almost double the amount on the website. Unfortunately that was a drawback. I am definitely looking for a permanent salon home, but  I am looking for affordable quick  weaves.  Since you get what you pay for, I will have to take that into consideration!

resp.text: Thank you

name: MarkMy Words
text: Last minute cast needs were taken care of promptly and professionally. Thanks Salon Wygs! Everyone looked amazing!

resp.text: Lol! Thanks

name: Tee W
text: Love going to Ki.  She's very good at what she does.   I always leave pleased with my style!
